meanings.sent1: He made a lunkheaded mistake by forgetting his keys again.
meanings.sent2: The lunkheaded student struggled to understand the simple math problem.
meanings.sent3: The lunkheaded squirrel tried to climb a glass window thinking it was a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her lunkheaded decision to wear flip-flops in the snow left her with freezing toes.
meanings.sent5: The lunkheaded giant couldn't fit through the tiny door no matter how hard he tried.

meanings.definition: Acting in a foolish or clumsy manner
meanings.sent1: She felt lunkheaded after tripping over her own feet in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: The lunkheaded clown kept dropping his juggling balls during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The lunkheaded chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: His lunkheaded attempt at fixing the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The lunkheaded dancer spun in the wrong direction and crashed into the wall.
